children.name: description
children.label: Description
children.default: The brightest out of us, King Banana, gave us the mystical recipe to create the best banana smoothie in the kingdom

default.title: Creation of Juicy Drink
default.description: The brightest out of us, King Banana, gave us the mystical recipe to create the best banana smoothie in the kingdom

default.title: Creation of Juicy Cafe
default.description: Our first cafe for our juicy drinks had massive success and costumers kept buying the royal smoothies as well as our own personal creations

default.title: Our first Million Dollars
default.description: After expanding our business into various towns and cities by opening new cafes, we finally reached our first million dollars in revenue!

default.title: Manufacture of Drinks
default.description: After having massive success over the years with our cafes, we decided to manufacture them so more people can drink our creations
